Buffalo.Scajaquada Creek:
Scajaquada Creek ( skə-JAH-kwə-də) is a stream in Erie County, New York, United States. The name is derived from Philip Kenjockety, an Indian described as the oldest resident of the region upon his death in 1808.
The creek lends its name to the Scajaquada Expressway, New York State Route 198, a highway that briefly adjoins the creek's northern shore.
